Job Posting:175362 - Position: W26 Data Engineer (Co-op) - Winter Term 175362B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 11/20/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 11/13/2025 04:04 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country League Inc. 225 King Street West Toronto M5V 3C6 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description About League 2026 - Winter W26 Data Engineer (Co-op) - Winter Term 175362B Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 months Hybrid In-Person CAD 0.0 per hour for 0 Major List $25 - $30 CAD Founded in 2014, League is the leading healthcare consumer experience (CX) platform, powered by artificial intelligence (AI), reaching more than 63 million people around the world and delivering the highest level of personalization in the industry. Payers, providers, and consumer health partners build on League's platform to deliver high-engagement healthcare solutions proven to improve health outcomes. League has raised over $285 million in venture capital funding to date, powering the digital experiences for some of healthcare's most trusted brands, including Highmark Health, Manulife, Medibank, and Shoppers Drug Mart. Data Engineer Launch Your Data Engineering Career! Join our team and gain hands-on experience in building and maintaining data pipelines. You'll learn the fundamentals of ETL processes, data warehousing, software development, working with large datasets, and AI systems. Participate in designing and implementing data solutions, contributing to data quality initiatives, and exploring cutting- edge data technologies. This co-op is your chance to build a strong foundation in a rapidly growing field. Some things the data team works on: • Learning about real-time and batch pipelines with Python and SQL • Software Development, Terraform Deployment for fault-tolerant, scalable systems Root cause analysis of production issues, performance tuning and optimization • Some of the technologies we use on the data engineering team include: GCP, python/SQL, Airflow, Terraform, Looker • Security-related Responsibilities: • Compliance with Information Security Policies • Compliance with League's secure coding practice • Responsibility and accountability for executing League's policies and procedures Notification of HR, Legal, Compliance & Security of any incidents, breaches or policy violations • Job Requirements Your career experience so far may include: • Exposure to data engineering projects and technologies • Hands on software development Previous engineering co-op experience • Please note: This is an in-office position at our Toronto HQ from Monday to Thursday. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: Job Application for Data Engineer (Co-op) - Winter Term at League Inc. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
